Uses of Package
uni.joel.deckard.logic

  • Packages that use uni.joel.deckard.logic 
    Package Description
    uni.joel.deckard.logic  
    uni.joel.deckard.logic.cards  
    uni.joel.deckard.ui  
  • Classes in uni.joel.deckard.logic used by uni.joel.deckard.logic 
    Class and Description
    Deck
    Deck-class with methods for modifying the cards it contains.
    Hand
    A player in a battle has a hand composed of a few cards.
    Player
    Player has a name, their deck, their hand (if they are in battle), hitpoints, armor, mana and manaRecovery which are all int values.
  • Classes in uni.joel.deckard.logic used by uni.joel.deckard.logic.cards 
    Class and Description
    Player
    Player has a name, their deck, their hand (if they are in battle), hitpoints, armor, mana and manaRecovery which are all int values.
  • Classes in uni.joel.deckard.logic used by uni.joel.deckard.ui 
    Class and Description
    Battle
    The main part of the game is the battle screen and actions.
    Game
    The game class.
    Player
    Player has a name, their deck, their hand (if they are in battle), hitpoints, armor, mana and manaRecovery which are all int values.
